data.name: ZONE OF THE ENDERS: The 2nd Runner MARS / ANUBIS ZONE OF THE ENDERS: MARS Demo
data.detailed_description:
ZONE OF THE ENDERS: The 2nd Runner comes with 4K and VR support to PC for the first time in this fast-paced demo!

• Discover JEHUTY in stunning 4K with or fly in first-person view in VR mode
• Dash into BAHRAM’s battleship at breath-taking speed
• Face off ARDJET, NEPHTIS and ANUBIS

JEHUTY lives. And there, ANUBIS thrives. Relive the experience ZONE OF THE ENDERS: The 2nd Runner - MARS as a full-length remaster of the classic fast-paced 3D robot action game, recreated in VR, native 4K and in full surround sound. Enter JEHUTY’s cockpit and fly through Martian skies!

The year is 2174 and the despotic BAHRAM military organisation is using new Orbital Frames robot technology to secure its grip on Mars and Earth. Seizing control of the JEHUTY Orbital Frame, the player is the last hope for the stricken planets. Strike deep at the heart of the BAHRAM army with unrivaled powers!

*You will not be able to carry over your save data to the full game.

data.short_description: ZONE OF THE ENDERS: The 2nd Runner - M∀RS Remastered in 4K and full VR. Enter Orbital Frame JEHUTY's cockpit and fly through Martian skies!

fullgame.name: ZONE OF THE ENDERS THE 2nd RUNNER : M∀RS / アヌビス ゾーン・オブ・エンダーズ : マーズ

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 3.70Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: XInput Controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7600K　3.8GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: XInput Controller required
